title: Tell Me Why: RHOBH Chaos & A RHOA Recap!
itunes:title: Tell Me Why: RHOBH Chaos & A RHOA Recap!
description:
Danny does his best to make sense of the RHOBH chaos that's happening (more to come with the next RHOBH recap), plus he recaps this week's episode of The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured model casting drama, a Goodwill party, unhinged invitations, and so much more!


RHOA Recap: 11:46ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
